name: 420pinball
short_description: I want to gain help programming MUSHROOM PINBALL  to place into Walmart under the Minorities with Disabilities program. Alone it will never get done so if you are a philanthropist looking to help out someone with a real need for a project backing to help create financial wealth and get off of disability I would be grateful. I have become very depressed without finding anyone willing to help even suicidal last week but trying to hang in there best as I can. Being a quadriplegic since I was eighteen in 1985 has been a patience builder but without hope of something to hold on to... there is nothing left to hold on to, to keep the faith or something to live for.  804-672-8538
summary: Game developer for Spinal Cord Injury Awareness
